attributes.action: Change the name of John Lennon Airport to Lennon McCartney Airport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having just come back from holiday via Liverpool Airport It seemed strange that only one of the two Iconic members of the Beatles is referred to in the name of the Airport. After all, McCartney was more than an equal partner in this song wrting phenomena, and he was and is the one who throughout his life has kept his links with Liverpool, unlike Lennon who emigrated to The USA.

Wouldn't the:
       "LENNON McCARTNEY AIRPORT"
be a more appropriate name for Liverpool's gateway to the World?
Please support this petition and write to Liverpool Council

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
